title: ImageDrawArc
name: ImageDrawArc
description: Draws a circular or elliptical arc.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the arc.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the arc.

arguments.name: arcAngle
arguments.description: The angular extent of the arc, relative to the start angle.

arguments.name: filled
arguments.description:
Specify whether the arc is filled:
- true: The arc is filled with the specified drawing color.
- false (default): Only the outline of the arc is drawn.
